select.request: Do you really want to switch to another crew? If you are an ASP of your current crew, you will lose your permissions in the pool.

supporterForm.title: Supporter
supporterForm.infoBox: Your full name, your date of birth and your address are required for the registration for actions. Your phone number will be used for short-term arrangements before actions.

upload.initial:
Drag your image here to begin
or click to browse
upload.failure:
An error occured.
Unfortunately, you can not upload any images at the moment.
upload.success:
Successfully uploaded an image!
Upload a new one or crop your image above.

error.msg: The selected image has not been loaded successfully.

maxLength.title: Image is to big
maxLength.msg: The maximum image size is 5 MB.

nvm.title: Non-voting membership
nvm.description: Please read the §4 (2) of the Articles of Association to inform you about the non-voting membership of Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.

status.noAddress: We need your address for the non-voting membership.
status.noPrimaryCrew: You need to select a crew to become an active supporter
status.inActive: You have to be active in your crew to become an non-voting member.
status.apply: As an active member of your crew you are able to become an non-voting member of Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. This membership is non-contributory and must be actively renewed once a year here in your pool profile.
status.confirmation: According to §4 (2) of the Articles of Association, I hereby apply for inclusion in the Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V. as a non-voting association member. Membership is considered accepted insofar as it is not contradicted by authorized representatives of the association. To complete the membership you have to click the button below:
status.renew: Your non-voting membership has expired, please renew your membership to stay a non-voting member.

inactive.confirm: Do you want to end you non-voting membership in Viva con Agua de Sankt Pauli e.V.?

request.confirm: Do you want to become a non-voting member of Viva con Agua de Santk Pauli e.V. Please confirm you have read the §4 (2) of the Articles of Association?

success.title: Success
success.message: Your state of non-voting membership has successfully been changed!

error.title: Error
error.message: Your state of non-voting membership could not be changed!

status.apply: If you are an active VcA supporter of your crew, then you can request this via the button at your ASPs and confirm - so if you, for example. participate in team meetings, get involved in actions or engage in education.
status.noCrew: You need to select a crew to become an active supporter
status.requested: You have requested to be an active supporter of your crew. Please wait until an ASP of your crew has confirmed your request. You can also withdraw your request at any time.
status.active: You are an active supporter of your crew. You can end your activity in the crew here.

inactive.confirm: Do you want to end your state as an active supporter?

unset.confirm: Do you want to remove your application as an active supporter?

request.confirm: Do you want to apply as an active supporter?

success.title: Success
success.message: Your state as active member of your crew has successfully been changed!

error.title: Found no user
error.msg: The requested user has not been found at the database.

actions.non-voting-membership-spoiler: The non-voting membership is coming soon...

notAuthorized.title: Not saved
notAuthorized.message: You are not authorized, thus you are not allowed to update your profile.

notFound.title: Not saved
notFound.message: Since your profile has not been found, it can not be updated.

error.title: Error on Newsletter-Settings
error.msg: Your settings have not been saved.

serverError.title: Internal Error
serverError.msg: Unfortunately, an internal error occurred. Please try again later.

unAuthorized.title: Not identified
unAuthorized.msg: We can not identify your user. Thus, we are not able to sign you out.

info.token: Redirect follows soon. Please contact us via e-mail, if an error occurs.

finish.title: You're almost done!
finish.description: You are the Drop! We've send you an e-mail with instructions to complete your SignUp!

password.empty: You have not entered any password

email.empty: You have not entered any e-mail address
email.unequal: Both e-mail addresses are not equal.

unAuthorized.msg: You are not allowed to register yourself. Please send us an e-mail to alert us about this problem.

serverError.title: Internal error
serverError.msg: An internal error occurred. Please send us an e-mail to alert us about this problem.

badRequest.msg: Your data has issued an error. Please send us an e-mail to alert us about this problem.

notFound.title: Nothing found
notFound.msg: Nothing could be found about it. Please contact us via e-mail to draw our attention to this problem.

signin.title: Login

serverError.title: Internal error
serverError.msg: An internal error occurred. Please send us an e-mail to alert us about this problem.

bogus.msg: Your data has issued an error. Please send us an e-mail to alert us about this problem.

success.title: Created
success.msg: The new OAuth client has been added. It can authenticate users of Drops.

oauth.noClients: Currently, there are no OAuth clients...

alert.title: e-mail was sent
alert.description: You will receive the e-mail in the next few minutes. Please hold the line ;-)

PasswordInstructions.title: you forgot your password?
PasswordInstructions.description: no problem, just enter here your e-mail address and we will send you the instructions per mail to reset it.

PasswordInstructionsPool1.title: first login into the new Pool?
PasswordInstructionsPool1.description: we've noticed this is your first login to the new Pool. We will send you the instructuins per mail to set a new one password.

Password.title: reset your password
Password.description: To protect your account, please use a secure password.

thingstoinclude.title: Things to include:
thingstoinclude.2: •One or more of each of the following: lower-case letter, upper-case letter, number, special charakter

thingstoavoid.title: Things to avoid:
thingstoavoid.1: •Words you can find in the dictionary.
thingstoavoid.2: •Keyboard patterns, like qwerty or 12345. Particularly avoid sequences of numbers in order
thingstoavoid.3: •The same password you use for another application.

PasswordDone.title: Everything done
PasswordDone.description: You will be redirected to the sign in page in a few seconds...

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.description: To set a new password, please fill in your old password.

changeEMail.title: Change your e-mail address
changeEMail.description: To change your e-mail address, please fill in your old e-Mail address

message.401: You have to be logged in to visit this page
message.403: You have no permission to access this page

errorState.status: Please write us an e-mail, if need additional support. The mail should contain the address that you would like to access, the error code ({code}) and your pool account's e-mail address.

ie.msg: The Internet Explorer does not allow an error-free display of this interface at the moment. This will be added shortly. Please use another browser, such as {0}.
